issue.title: Make commit classifier apply the phabricator patch

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
Commit classifier now applies the phabricator patch as its first step(right after the cloning).
This PR resolves issue #1268

body:
Hello @marco-c .
I have sent a PR for this issue.
I am facing a problem for the TaskGroup checks, "bugbug link" task has failed while rest of them has passed.
Can you tell me how to resolve this problem?

Logs : https://community-tc.services.mozilla.com/tasks/MsFDby5-QRSxkFM04ed4Tg/runs/0/logs/https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity-tc.services.mozilla.com%2Fapi%2Fqueue%2Fv1%2Ftask%2FMsFDby5-QRSxkFM04ed4Tg%2Fruns%2F0%2Fartifacts%2Fpublic%2Flogs%2Flive.log
Let's discuss in the PR itself about issues with it.
